sentence.Network_en: The gardener used a stake to support the uprightness of the fragile plant.
sentence.Network_cn: 这位园丁用了一个木柱将这株娇嫩的植物撑直.

sentence.Network_en: They are steadfast for ever and ever, done in faithfulness and uprightness.
sentence.Network_cn: 是永永远远坚定的, 是按诚实正直设立的.

sentence.Network_en: My grandfather was venerable for his age, his uprightness, and sagacity.
sentence.Network_cn: 我祖父以他的年长, 正直和睿智而受人尊敬.

2. position at right angles to the horizon
3. uprightness as a consequence of being honorable and honest
